data.name: Green Hawk Down
data.detailed_description:
Ever play with those little green plastic army guys as a kid? Well, so did we. We just wanted to bring these guys back into 2022 and give them a make-over.

Yes, there have been a few games out there that feature these little plastic dudes, but we weren't able to find any game with the mechanics we wanted. We wanted a huge, multiplayer Battle Royale with the same feel as other popular franchises in this genre.

We've worked hard on getting the mechanics right, and staying true to the Battle Royale feel. Adding tanks, jeeps, helicopters, planes, controllable guns, turrets, parachutes and even grappling hooks and rockets, has really helped enrich the experience. We've also been working hard developing different weapons and classes for each soldier. Riflemen, Snipers, Heavy Machine-gunners, Grenadiers, Medics and Rocket Men are just some of the classes that we're working on!

We've decided to go for the Free-To-Play model, so we can introduce DLC later on. We don't believe in the whole "Pay-To-Win" concept, so don't worry - we won't ever do that to you. Any DLC released will be purely cosmetic. You'll have to grind to build up tactical assets through in-game money that cannot be purchased with real money.
data.about_the_game:
Ever play with those little green plastic army guys as a kid? Well, so did we. We just wanted to bring these guys back into 2022 and give them a make-over.

Yes, there have been a few games out there that feature these little plastic dudes, but we weren't able to find any game with the mechanics we wanted. We wanted a huge, multiplayer Battle Royale with the same feel as other popular franchises in this genre.

We've worked hard on getting the mechanics right, and staying true to the Battle Royale feel. Adding tanks, jeeps, helicopters, planes, controllable guns, turrets, parachutes and even grappling hooks and rockets, has really helped enrich the experience. We've also been working hard developing different weapons and classes for each soldier. Riflemen, Snipers, Heavy Machine-gunners, Grenadiers, Medics and Rocket Men are just some of the classes that we're working on!

We've decided to go for the Free-To-Play model, so we can introduce DLC later on. We don't believe in the whole "Pay-To-Win" concept, so don't worry - we won't ever do that to you. Any DLC released will be purely cosmetic. You'll have to grind to build up tactical assets through in-game money that cannot be purchased with real money.
data.short_description: GREEN HAWK DOWN is an action-packed, multi-player FPS that allows you to fight in the smallest army in the world! Team up with other plastic toy soldiers and wage war against other teams for control of the kitchen, bedroom or back yard!

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 7 64bit
  • Processor: Intel I5-2500K, AMD FX-8120
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 2GB of Video Memory & NVIDIA GeForce GTX 660, AMD Radeon HD7870
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 12 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 64bit
  • Processor: Intel I7-3770, AMD FX 8350 4.0 Ghz
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia RTX 3060
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 12 GB available space
